statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIPPER_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERDATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FINALCUSTOMER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DEALER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_START_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_END_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`SID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3HISTORY ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIPPER_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERDATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FINALCUSTOMER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DEALER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_START_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSE_END_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY2_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `YEAR3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSESTART3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `LICENSEEND3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MONEY3_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MODIFYUSER` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ACTION` VARCHAR(200) NULL, `UPDATETIME` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3HISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , SHIP_DATE_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , SHIPPER_NUMBER_V , COMPACT_V , PAYMENT_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V , PHONE_V , ORDERDATE_V , FAX_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , ADDRESS_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , FINALCUSTOMER_V , DEALER_V , ITEM_V , PRODUCT_V , AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V , QUANTITY_V , YEAR_V , LICENSE_START_V , LICENSE_END_V , MONEY_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT2_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V , QUANTITY2_V , YEAR2_V , LICENSESTART2_V , LICENSEEND2_V , MONEY2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT3_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V , QUANTITY3_V , YEAR3_V , LICENSESTART3_V , LICENSEEND3_V , MONEY3_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V , SALES_TAX_V , TOTAL_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'UPDATE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 WHERE SID = #SID#

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3HISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , SHIP_DATE_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , SHIPPER_NUMBER_V , COMPACT_V , PAYMENT_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V , PHONE_V , ORDERDATE_V , FAX_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , ADDRESS_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , FINALCUSTOMER_V , DEALER_V , ITEM_V , PRODUCT_V , AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V , QUANTITY_V , YEAR_V , LICENSE_START_V , LICENSE_END_V , MONEY_V , ITEM2_V , PRODUCT2_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V , QUANTITY2_V , YEAR2_V , LICENSESTART2_V , LICENSEEND2_V , MONEY2_V , ITEM3_V , PRODUCT3_V , AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V , QUANTITY3_V , YEAR3_V , LICENSESTART3_V , LICENSEEND3_V , MONEY3_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V , SALES_TAX_V , TOTAL_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'DELETE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.select: Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 LIMIT #START_V# , #LIMIT_V#
statements.statement: Select REPORTTITLE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE REPORTTITLE_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTTITLE_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(REPORTTITLE_V) AS REPORTTITLE_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE REPORTTITLE_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTTITLE_V
statements.statement: Select REPORTNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE REPORTNAME_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTNAME_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(REPORTNAME_V) AS REPORTNAME_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE REPORTNAME_V != '' ORDER BY REPORTNAME_V

statements.statement: Select COMPACT_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE COMPACT_V != '' ORDER BY COMPACT_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(COMPACT_V) AS COMPACT_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE COMPACT_V != '' ORDER BY COMPACT_V
statements.statement: Select PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V != '' ORDER BY PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V) AS PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V != '' ORDER BY PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V
statements.statement: Select QUOTATIONNO_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4 WHERE QUOTATIONNO_V != '' ORDER BY QUOTATIONNO_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(QUOTATIONNO_V) AS QUOTATIONNO_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4 WHERE QUOTATIONNO_V != '' ORDER BY QUOTATIONNO_V
statements.statement: Select FINALCUSTOMER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 WHERE FINALCUSTOMER_V != '' ORDER BY FINALCUSTOMER_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(FINALCUSTOMER_V) AS FINALCUSTOMER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 WHERE FINALCUSTOMER_V != '' ORDER BY FINALCUSTOMER_V
statements.statement: Select DEALER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 WHERE DEALER_V != '' ORDER BY DEALER_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(DEALER_V) AS DEALER_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 WHERE DEALER_V != '' ORDER BY DEALER_V
statements.statement: Select ITEM_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE ITEM_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM_V

statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(ITEM2_V) AS ITEM2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE ITEM2_V != '' ORDER BY ITEM2_V
statements.statement: Select PRODUCT2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT2_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT2_V
statements.select: Select distinct CONCAT(PRODUCT2_V) AS PRODUCT2_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3_INPUT WHERE PRODUCT2_V != '' ORDER BY PRODUCT2_V

statements.insert: INSERT INTO RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3(SID, AXTMODIFY, REPORTTITLE_V, REPORTNAME_V, CUSTOMERNAME_V, SHIP_DATE_V, UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V, SHIPPER_NUMBER_V, COMPACT_V, PAYMENT_DATE_V, EMAIL_V, PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V, PHONE_V, ORDERDATE_V, FAX_V, QUOTATIONNO_V, ADDRESS_V, DELIVERYADDRESS_V, FINALCUSTOMER_V, DEALER_V, ITEM_V, PRODUCT_V, AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V, QUANTITY_V, YEAR_V, LICENSE_START_V, LICENSE_END_V, MONEY_V, ITEM2_V, PRODUCT2_V, AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V, QUANTITY2_V, YEAR2_V, LICENSESTART2_V, LICENSEEND2_V, MONEY2_V, ITEM3_V, PRODUCT3_V, AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V, QUANTITY3_V, YEAR3_V, LICENSESTART3_V, LICENSEEND3_V, MONEY3_V, NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V, SALES_TAX_V, TOTAL_V, NOTE_V, HEAD_V, MANAGER_V, ATTN_V, CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V) VALUES(#SID#, #AXTMODIFY#, #REPORTTITLE_V#, #REPORTNAME_V#, #CUSTOMERNAME_V#, #SHIP_DATE_V#, #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#, #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#, #COMPACT_V#, #PAYMENT_DATE_V#, #EMAIL_V#, #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#, #PHONE_V#, #ORDERDATE_V#, #FAX_V#, #QUOTATIONNO_V#, #ADDRESS_V#, #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#, #FINALCUSTOMER_V#, #DEALER_V#, #ITEM_V#, #PRODUCT_V#, #AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V#, #QUANTITY_V#, #YEAR_V#, #LICENSE_START_V#, #LICENSE_END_V#, #MONEY_V#, #ITEM2_V#, #PRODUCT2_V#, #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V#, #QUANTITY2_V#, #YEAR2_V#, #LICENSESTART2_V#, #LICENSEEND2_V#, #MONEY2_V#, #ITEM3_V#, #PRODUCT3_V#, #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V#, #QUANTITY3_V#, #YEAR3_V#, #LICENSESTART3_V#, #LICENSEEND3_V#, #MONEY3_V#, #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V#, #SALES_TAX_V#, #TOTAL_V#, #NOTE_V#, #HEAD_V#, #MANAGER_V#, #ATTN_V#, #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#)
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3 SET AXTMODIFY = #AXTMODIFY#,REPORTTITLE_V = #REPORTTITLE_V#,REPORTNAME_V = #REPORTNAME_V#,CUSTOMERNAME_V = #CUSTOMERNAME_V#,SHIP_DATE_V = #SHIP_DATE_V#,UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V = #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#,SHIPPER_NUMBER_V = #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#,COMPACT_V = #COMPACT_V#,PAYMENT_DATE_V = #PAYMENT_DATE_V#,EMAIL_V = #EMAIL_V#,PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V = #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#,PHONE_V = #PHONE_V#,ORDERDATE_V = #ORDERDATE_V#,FAX_V = #FAX_V#,QUOTATIONNO_V = #QUOTATIONNO_V#,ADDRESS_V = #ADDRESS_V#,DELIVERYADDRESS_V = #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#,FINALCUSTOMER_V = #FINALCUSTOMER_V#,DEALER_V = #DEALER_V#,ITEM_V = #ITEM_V#,PRODUCT_V = #PRODUCT_V#,AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V = #AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V#,QUANTITY_V = #QUANTITY_V#,YEAR_V = #YEAR_V#,LICENSE_START_V = #LICENSE_START_V#,LICENSE_END_V = #LICENSE_END_V#,MONEY_V = #MONEY_V#,ITEM2_V = #ITEM2_V#,PRODUCT2_V = #PRODUCT2_V#,AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V = #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V#,QUANTITY2_V = #QUANTITY2_V#,YEAR2_V = #YEAR2_V#,LICENSESTART2_V = #LICENSESTART2_V#,LICENSEEND2_V = #LICENSEEND2_V#,MONEY2_V = #MONEY2_V#,ITEM3_V = #ITEM3_V#,PRODUCT3_V = #PRODUCT3_V#,AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V = #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V#,QUANTITY3_V = #QUANTITY3_V#,YEAR3_V = #YEAR3_V#,LICENSESTART3_V = #LICENSESTART3_V#,LICENSEEND3_V = #LICENSEEND3_V#,MONEY3_V = #MONEY3_V#,NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V = #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V#,SALES_TAX_V = #SALES_TAX_V#,TOTAL_V = #TOTAL_V#,NOTE_V = #NOTE_V#,HEAD_V = #HEAD_V#,MANAGER_V = #MANAGER_V#,ATTN_V = #ATTN_V#,CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V = #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.statement:
Select * From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
SHIP_DATE_V like #SHIP_DATE_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
SHIPPER_NUMBER_V like #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
PAYMENT_DATE_V like #PAYMENT_DATE_V#
EMAIL_V like #EMAIL_V#
PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V like #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#
PHONE_V like #PHONE_V#
ORDERDATE_V like #ORDERDATE_V#
FAX_V like #FAX_V#
QUOTATIONNO_V like #QUOTATIONNO_V#
ADDRESS_V like #ADDRESS_V#
DELIVERYADDRESS_V like #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#
FINALCUSTOMER_V like #FINALCUSTOMER_V#
DEALER_V like #DEALER_V#
ITEM_V like #ITEM_V#
PRODUCT_V like #PRODUCT_V#
AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V like #AUTORIZATION_NUMBER_V#
QUANTITY_V like #QUANTITY_V#
YEAR_V like #YEAR_V#
LICENSE_START_V like #LICENSE_START_V#
LICENSE_END_V like #LICENSE_END_V#
MONEY_V like #MONEY_V#
ITEM2_V like #ITEM2_V#
PRODUCT2_V like #PRODUCT2_V#
AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V like #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER2_V#
QUANTITY2_V like #QUANTITY2_V#
YEAR2_V like #YEAR2_V#
LICENSESTART2_V like #LICENSESTART2_V#
LICENSEEND2_V like #LICENSEEND2_V#
MONEY2_V like #MONEY2_V#
ITEM3_V like #ITEM3_V#
PRODUCT3_V like #PRODUCT3_V#
AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V like #AUTHORIZATIONNUMBER3_V#
QUANTITY3_V like #QUANTITY3_V#
YEAR3_V like #YEAR3_V#
LICENSESTART3_V like #LICENSESTART3_V#
LICENSEEND3_V like #LICENSEEND3_V#
MONEY3_V like #MONEY3_V#
NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V like #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_V#
SALES_TAX_V like #SALES_TAX_V#
TOTAL_V like #TOTAL_V#
NOTE_V like #NOTE_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
MANAGER_V like #MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V like #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#
order by SHIP_DATE_V desc LIMIT #START_V#, #LIMIT_V#

SELECT * FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT
WORK_EVENT_V like #WORKEVENT_V#
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT SET WORK_EVENT_V = #WORK_EVENT_V#, STATUS_V = #STATUS_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3
statements.statement:
Select CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select CUSTOMERNAME_V as FINALCUSTOMER_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select DEALER_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select ADDRESS_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select FAX_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select PHONE_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select EMAIL_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select COMPACT_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select SHIP_DATE_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select RESELLERNAME_V as CUSTOMERNAME_V From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION4
quotationno_v like #QUOTATIONNO_V#

Select COUNT(*) AS NUM From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_SHIPPER3
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
SHIP_DATE_V like #SHIP_DATE_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
SHIPPER_NUMBER_V like #SHIPPER_NUMBER_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
PAYMENT_DATE_V like #PAYMENT_DATE_V#
EMAIL_V like #EMAIL_V#
PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V like #PURCHASEORDERNUMBER_V#
